mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, nickname, name, dob, gender, email, tel, addr, addr1, email_flag, sms_flag, point, rank, picture) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{dob}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{addr1}, #{email_flag}, #{sms_flag}, #{point}, #{rank}, #{picture})
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, nickname=#{nickname}, name=#{name}, dob=#{dob}, gender=#{gender}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, addr=#{addr}, addr1=#{addr1}, email_flag=#{email_flag}, sms_flag=#{sms_flag}, point=#{point}, rank=#{rank}, picture=#{picture} where id=#{id}
